column1: #Text=" Zuko says : " Let the kid go .
#Text=" Gow says : " Who do you think you are , telling us what to do ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " It does n't matter who I am .
#Text=You do n't want Lee in your army – you 're sick cowards messing with a family who 's already lost one son to the war .
#Text=" Gow says : " Are you gon na let this stranger stand there and insult you like this ?
#Text=" Old man says : " Give him a left !
#Text=" Old woman says : " It 's not a fistfight ... " Old man says : " He 's got a left sword , do n't he ?
#Text=" Ursa says : " Zuko , please , my love , listen to me .
#Text=Everything I 've done , I 've done to protect you .
#Text=No matter how things may seem to change , never forget who you are .
#Text=" Gow says : " Who ... who are you ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " My name is Zuko .
#Text=Son of Ursa and Fire Lord Ozai .
#Text=Prince of the Fire Nation , and heir to the throne .
#Text=You 're not a prince , you 're an outcast !
#Text=His own father burned and disowned him !
#Text=" Sela says : " Not a step closer .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " No one knows .
#Text=Oh , and last night , Grandpa passed away .
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Not funny , Azula !
#Text=And I want my knife back , now .
#Text=" Young Azula says : " Who 's going to make me ?
#Text=" Young Zuko says : " Where is she ?
